name: Summer Roguelike Project - Week 2
description:
This is my entry for week 2 of Reddit's Summer Roguelike Tutorial.

Each week, I'll be using Construct 3 to complete the required steps and posting the results here. By the end, I should have a fully-fledged roguelike!

You can follow my progress here on Twitter!

This week, I focused on: 

  • Placing doors throughout the dungeon.
  • Adjusting FOV based on whether or not a door is present.
  • Allowing the player to open doors.
  • Having monsters spawn throughout the dungeon.
  • Having monsters "notice" you when you approach.
  • Being able to attack and defeat monsters.

If you have any feedback, feel free to leave it below! See you next week!
